title: Drawing, "Design for a Centerpiece", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at center right: 227
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: MILIEU DE TABLE/DIAMETRE: 25 cms/HAUTEUR TOTALE: 17 cms/ENCOMBREMENT DES ANSES: 31 cms; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/42.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Circular centerpiece drawn in plan and elevation encircled by a thick handle indicated in red ink decorated at the top by pairs of applied triple bands connecting the handle to the body. Raised on a trapezoidal-shaped base ending in a circular foot. Underdrawing in graphite of centerpiece in golden section.
Puiforcat fabrication #: 227

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Centerpiece", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-49.
